intro.name: Kota Durga
paragraphs: I'm a DevOps Engineer with 6+ years of experience in building and maintaining scalable cloud infrastructure.
My passion lies in automating everything - from CI/CD pipelines to infrastructure provisioning - ensuring systems are reliable, secure, and cost-effective.

experience.title: Senior DevOps Engineer
experience.description: Leading infrastructure automation, Kubernetes operations, and GitOps-based delivery.
responsibilities: Engineered CI/CD pipelines that improved release speed and delivery reliability.
Architected cloud infrastructure with Infrastructure as Code for secure, repeatable deployments.
Orchestrated Kubernetes deployments and administered clusters for stability and scale.
Automated platform operations using Python (boto3) and shell scripting.
Implemented monitoring and alerting to detect issues proactively and protect uptime.
Led incident response and mentored engineers through DevOps best practices.

experience.title: GIS Engineer
experience.description: Built geospatial automation workflows with Python and MySQL.
responsibilities: Developed automation scripts for geospatial data processing tasks.
Built and maintained MySQL-backed workflows for operational data.
Improved data quality checks and reduced manual validation effort.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to streamline delivery.
Supported production issues with structured debugging and root-cause analysis.
Established engineering foundations that later accelerated my DevOps growth.

acquired: AWS Educate: Completed foundational AWS Cloud and Cloud Operations badges
